title: [Teorainn Dale, Boulder]
description: The huge, blunt stone juts up from the ground like a massive fist.  Flakes of mica catch and reflect the moonlight, making the hulking dark boulder sparkle.  Thorny scrub bushes surround the boulder.  A low, dark path leads north, dipping down under a jagged overhang of rock.
